attributes.action: Have Jim Cassell (Manchester City FC Academy) recognised in the Queens Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jim Cassell and his team have worked with the youth academy at Manchester City for the past 11 years. In his time with City the youth team have won the Youth Cup trophy on two occasions.
Jim and his able team have put in strong foundations for the club to build on numerous young players have been developed to first team level. Players such as Micah Richards and Shaun Wright Phillips have already played in the England first team and we believe that Jim deserves recognition in the Honours list for all his sterling work.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
